metadata.Plot: Five people are affected by a tragic heroic act. 12 years later, each of them will have to confront the past, through their own crisis. Will they overcome the guilt, frustration, urge for revenge? Will they do the right thing, at all costs?
metadata.Actors: Aleksandar Bercek, Dejan Cukic, Leon Lucev
